# `dfr is-unique` for [dataframe](/commands/categories/dataframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>Creates mask indicating unique values.</div>

::: warning
Dataframe commands were not shipped in the official binaries by default, you have to build it with `--features=dataframe` flag
:::

## Signature

```> dfr is-unique {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Create mask indicating unique values
```nu
> [5 6 6 6 8 8 8] | dfr into-df | dfr is-unique
╭───┬───────────╮
│ # │ is_unique │
├───┼───────────┤
│ 0 │ true      │
│ 1 │ false     │
│ 2 │ false     │
│ 3 │ false     │
│ 4 │ false     │
│ 5 │ false     │
│ 6 │ false     │
╰───┴───────────╯

```

Create mask indicating duplicated rows in a dataframe
```nu
> [[a, b]; [1 2] [1 2] [3 3] [3 3] [1 1]] | dfr into-df | dfr is-unique
╭───┬───────────╮
│ # │ is_unique │
├───┼───────────┤
│ 0 │ false     │
│ 1 │ false     │
│ 2 │ false     │
│ 3 │ false     │
│ 4 │ true      │
╰───┴───────────╯

```
